ygData.messageBody:
>

I'm at 148 cant get any higher than that without the advanced pottery book (Anyone
find it yet?) , I did large bowls after 120 to get 148, now they are trivial. I
fail in tins about once or twice out of twenty. Good luck!

Devar of Veeshan
